convertStringToVector

public static Vector convertStringToVector(String srcStr,
                                           String delim)
The convertStringToVector method splits a source sting into substrings based on a specified delimeter and creates a vector from the resluting substrings.

Parameters:
srcStr - a String source string to be split.
delim - a String value of delimeter, used to split the source string.
Returns:
a Vector A Vector of substrings resulted after splitting the source string.

ordinal

public static String ordinal(int pNumber)
The ordinal method returns the ordinal string for any particular digit, that is, for 1 it returns "1st", for 2 it returns "2nd", and so on... Note that this method currently only returns the ordinal for US English, and it has not been internationalized.

Parameters:
pNumber, - an int.
Returns:
the ordinal string.
